newsitem.title: NORWAY: Norway Central Bank announces ad-hoc T-bill issue.
newsitem.headline: Norway Central Bank announces ad-hoc T-bill issue.

text.p: Norway's central bank, Norges Bank, said on Friday it would hold an ad-hoc issue of a new treasury bill with a maturity to November 17, 1997.
The bank said details of the new T-bill will be released on July 8 and the auction will take place on July 10.
